question: The Three-day annual Krishi Unnati Mela, focusing on 'doubling farmers' income' began at __________.
explanation: Three-day annual Krishi Unnati Mela, focusing on 'doubling farmers' income' began in New Delhi on March 16, 2018. The objective of Krishi Unnati Mela is to create awareness among farmers about latest agriculture related developments. Farmers and agri-scientists from various parts of India will be attending this Mela. 800 stalls displaying latest agriculture and allied sector technologies have been set up at the venue of Krishi Unnati Mela. A theme pavilion on doubling of farmers income, organic farming, cooperatives, farm inputs, has also been set up to familiarise farmers with the latest developments in the farming techniques.
